summary: Ryan asking a scuba operator about next-day availability for a mixed group of divers.
context: Inquiry for Sunday 8/18 availability in USVI for 4 discovery divers and 3 certified divers after last-minute plan changes.
text:
Hey Jacob!

I have a group on the island this weekend who had some plans change and were checking if you had availability tomorrow (Sunday 8/18) for 4 discovery divers and 3 certified divers. The certified divers can tag along with our discovery friends or go out if there’s a morning trip available during the intro work! Feel free to call or text me at (678) 477-4928 (or at this email) if you think that’s possible. Thanks for your time!

Respectfully,
Ryan
user_prompt: Draft an email in Ryan's voice. Context: Inquiry for Sunday 8/18 availability in USVI for 4 discovery divers and 3 certified divers after last-minute plan changes. Topic: scuba_scheduling Tone: polite, logistical, service_oriented
